Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I have an idea with this. There is a job long outstanding on trello. To show flow of coins across chains. While being a centralised service, a node running each daemon could pretty easily track all burns and imports to track where the coins are going, and post this data to an oracle. This can then be leveraged by a modified explorer to link cross chain txns in a visual way. Not really sure how best to do it. We should have enough people in here to figure it out though. Should be a good aim for this project to keep this goal in mind when designing the system.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I will be avalible later today after getting some other work finished off. Hopefully a few guys are around and we can try to come up with an outline of what it needs to do.

Content:

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Its possible to extract the OP_RETURN data on an import tx and decode it to get the burns txid ... So you can link to the burn on explorer quite easily I think. Not familiar with the explorers code base though, so not sure how to implement that, and also the burn cant link to the import using this method, so an external source of data is needed ot go in this direction.
